events.message: I recently received my order but want to return it and get a refund because it didn't meet my expectations.
The case was categorized as a refund request after reviewing the customer's message about wanting to return the product.
Support agent Emma has been assigned to handle the refund request for this customer.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm here to help you with the refund process for your recent order.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason why you'd like to return the item?
My order number is 123456789. The product does not work as described, so I want to return it and get my money back.
We can initiate your refund immediately once we receive the returned item. I will send you the return shipping label shortly.
Thank you for the quick response. I appreciate receiving the shipping label so I can return the item without additional cost.
The return shipping label has been sent via email. Please send back the product and the refund will be processed promptly.
Just checking in to confirm you received the return label and to see if you need any more assistance with the refund.
Yes, I received the label and sent the package already. Thanks for your assistance!
The returned item was received and your refund has been processed successfully. Thank you for your patience.
We are closing this refund case now. Please contact us if you have any further questions or issues.
